title: Accessories
content:
r any character, but other Equipment Features only serve as a boost for a specific action or spell, and may not stack if a character equips two pieces of Equipment with the same Equipment Feature, so it is recommended to equip your party wisely. Also consider that some Armor pieces and Weapons may provide Equipment Features as well.

Legendary Accessories

Legendary Accessories are the rarest amulets and rings in the game, usually dropped by special Bosses, found in secret places or obtained as
